query: How do I create a new campaign in Klaviyo
response: To create a new campaign in Klaviyo, navigate to the Campaigns tab and click on Create Campaign. From there, you can choose your campaign type, set up your email template, and customize your settings.

execution_details.implementation: 1. Authenticate with Klaviyo API key, 2. Send a POST request to the campaigns endpoint with campaign details, 3. Set up email template and customize settings
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API key validity, handle 401 Unauthorized errors, and catch any exceptions during the request

query: I want to create a welcome email campaign in Klaviyo
response: To create a welcome email campaign in Klaviyo, go to the Campaigns tab, click Create Campaign, and select the Welcome Series template. Then, customize your email content and settings to fit your brand.

execution_details.implementation: 1. Authenticate with Klaviyo API key, 2. Send a POST request to the campaigns endpoint with campaign details and template ID for welcome series, 3. Customize email content and settings
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API key validity, handle 401 Unauthorized errors, and catch any exceptions during the request

query: How do I set up an abandoned cart campaign in Klaviyo
response: To set up an abandoned cart campaign in Klaviyo, navigate to the Campaigns tab, click Create Campaign, and select the Abandoned Cart template. Then, configure your campaign settings and customize your email content.

execution_details.implementation: 1. Authenticate with Klaviyo API key, 2. Send a POST request to the campaigns endpoint with campaign details and template ID for abandoned cart, 3. Configure campaign settings and customize email content

query: I need to create a campaign to promote a new product in Klaviyo
response: To create a campaign to promote a new product in Klaviyo, go to the Campaigns tab, click Create Campaign, and select the Product Promotion template. Then, customize your email content and settings to showcase your new product.

query: Can I create a campaign in Klaviyo to nurture my leads
response: To create a campaign in Klaviyo to nurture your leads, navigate to the Campaigns tab, click Create Campaign, and select the Lead Nurturing template. Then, set up your email series and customize your settings to fit your lead nurturing strategy.

execution_details.implementation: 1. Authenticate with Klaviyo API key, 2. Send a POST request to the campaigns endpoint with campaign details and template ID for lead nurturing, 3. Set up email series and customize settings
execution_details.error_handling: Check for API key validity, handle 401 Unauthorized errors, and catch any exceptions during the request
